attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In interviews Mr Brown often reacts badly to questions he does not like, and sometimes even storms off.  We ask Mr Brown to keep his temper, and to answer those difficult questions.

rejection.details: Your petition makes a personal comment about the Prime Minister and does not relate to government policy.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
